--红包雨特效
---@class LuaUI_hongbaoForLua
LuaUI_hongbaoForLua = {}
local this = LuaUI_hongbaoForLua

---@type UnityEngine.GameObject
local selfObj = nil

---@type UnityEngine.Transform
local selfTrans = nil

local timetoken = 0

function LuaUI_hongbaoForLua.OnTimer()
    LuaUIManager.Instance:Hide("UI/GameSystem/UI_hongbaoForLua")
end

function LuaUI_hongbaoForLua.OnShow()

    timetoken = Hotfix.LuaWait(6000,this.OnTimer)

end

function LuaUI_hongbaoForLua.OnHide()
    Hotfix.RemoveTimer(timetoken)
end

---------------------------------------------------- Unity MonoBehaviour 生命周期 -------------------------------------------------
function LuaUI_hongbaoForLua.Awake(go)
    selfObj = go

    selfTrans = selfObj.transform

end

function LuaUI_hongbaoForLua.Start()

end

function LuaUI_hongbaoForLua.OnEnable()

end

function LuaUI_hongbaoForLua.OnDisable()

end

function LuaUI_hongbaoForLua.OnDestroy()

end
